name: Introduction to Instrumental Methods of Analysis
description: Scope of instrumental analytical chemistry; Fourier transform IR absorption spectroscopy; molecular luminescence; emission spectroscopy; mass spectrometry; sensors; gas and high performance liquid chromatography; instrument design principles and applications in industry and the environment. (Lab Materials Fee: $25).
prerequisites: CHM217H1 with a minimum grade of 63%; (MAT135H1, MAT136H1)/MAT137Y1/MAT157Y1
